objective1.question: Which of the following is handbrake?
objective1.hint: Handbrake is the one you should push up before leaving the car.
feedback: Correct.
Incorrect. It is a rearview mirror.
Incorrect. It is a brake pedal.
Incorrect. It is a clutch.

objective1.question: What light you should use when driving on the road in city at night?
objective1.hint: On city road, it is usually with lights by the side.
feedback: Incorrect. Full-beam headlamps can disturb the sight of other drivers near you.
Correct.

objective2.question: When the parking place is at left behind your car, which side should your steering wheel turn to?
objective2.hint: Recall how you turn your steering wheel when reversing.
feedback: Correct.
Incorrect. Your car will go back-right.

objective2.question: What should you do when your car starts to climbing a hill?
objective2.hint: Think about the resistance due to gravity.
feedback: Incorrect. Your car won't move if you step on brake.
Incorrect. Your car won't move if you step on brake.
Correct.
Incorrect. It can be dangerous to step on accelerator harshly.

objective3.question: Which of the following is the best time to change lane?
answers: When there is a car closing
When you are close to a crossroad
When there is no car nearby
objective3.hint: Put safety at the first place when you are on road.
feedback: Incorrect. Your car may change lane after the other car passes.
Incorrect. There is no enough space for you to change lane.
Correct.

objective3.question: Which of the following is a warning sign?
objective3.hint: Notice the color of the signs.
feedback: Incorrect. It is a regulatory sign.
Correct.
Incorrect. It is a guide sign.

summative.question: Which of the following is clutch?
summative.hint: Clutch is what you step on before you do the shift.
feedback: Incorrect. It is a turn signal switch.
Incorrect. It is a steer wheel.
Incorrect. It is a speedometer.
Correct.

summative.question: What should you do when your car starts to get down a hill?
summative.hint: Think about the influence of gravity.
feedback: Correct.
Incorrect. It can be dangerous to step on brake harshly.
Incorrect. Your car will go too fast if you step on accelerator and get down a hill.
Incorrect. It can be dangerous to step on accelerator harshly.

summative.question: Which of the following is a guide sign?
summative.hint: Notice the color of the signs.
feedback: Incorrect. It is a regulatory sign.
Incorrect. It is a warning sign.
Correct. It is a guide sign.
